mapper.select: /*[TsysAdmOrgGrpRolRtnn.xml][selectPsysOrgGrpRolRtnnGridList][조직별 권한 그룹 조회][TANINE]*/ SELECT OGRR.ORG_CD , OGRR.GRP_ROL_ID , O.ORG_NM , GR.GRP_ROL_NM FROM TSYS_ADM_ORG_GRP_ROL_RTNN OGRR , TSYS_ORG O , TSYS_ADM_GRP_ROL GR WHERE OGRR.ORG_CD = O.ORG_CD AND OGRR.GRP_ROL_ID = GR.GRP_ROL_ID AND OGRR.ORG_CD = #{org_cd, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

/*[TsysAdmOrgGrpRolRtnn.xml][selectTsysOrgGrpRolAllList][상위 조직에 따른 하위 조직 권한 그룹 검색][TANINE]*/ SELECT AA.* , BB.GRP_ROL_ID AS GRP_ROL_ID FROM ( SELECT ORG_CD , ORG_NM FROM TSYS_ORG WHERE ORG_CD = #{org_cd, jdbcType=NUMERIC} OR UP_ORG_CD = (SELECT ORG_CD FROM TSYS_ORG WHERE ORG_CD = #{org_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) OR UP_ORG_CD IN ( SELECT ORG_CD FROM TSYS_ORG WHERE UP_ORG_CD IN (SELECT ORG_CD FROM TSYS_ORG WHERE ORG_CD = #{org_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) ) AA LEFT JOIN TSYS_ADM_ORG_GRP_ROL_RTNN BB ON AA.ORG_CD = BB.ORG_CD
